subject: JU3.5 problem: debugging with JBuilder4
msgSnippet: With JUnit 3.2 and JBuilder4.0 everything was fine when debugging test-classes. Since JU3.5 just now and then there will be stopped at the FIRST breakpoint.
messageBody:
With JUnit 3.2 and JBuilder4.0 everything was fine when debugging
test-classes.
Since JU3.5 just now and then there will be stopped at the FIRST
breakpoint.
Subsequent breakpoints do not work either.

(we use weblogic5.1 SP8, and the argument "-noloading" for
TestRunner.main())

Does anybody have an idea how this can be fixed?

Thank you,

Lucas Filz
